channel.title: google analytics on Webb
channel.description: Recent content in google analytics on Webb

item.title: How to use google analytics in hugo website?
item.description: On Hugo website, by searching Google Analytics will find configure google analytics codes like these: googleAnalytics = 'UA-PROPERTY_ID' {{ template "_internal/google_analytics.html" . }} Put the first code at config.toml file. Put outside the [params], not in it. It’ll look like this: baseURL = "https://KPW10452025.github.io" title = "Webb" ... googleAnalytics = 'UA-220340577-1' [params] footer = "Love & Peace" description = "Hi! I'm Wdbb Kuo. This is my first personal website." ... Put the second code at head.
